mapper.select: SELECT tagname, alarmgroup, alarmdesc, COUNT(*) AS alarmcount FROM ( SELECT * FROM( SELECT tagname, tagvalue, alarmstate, alarmlevel, alarmgroup, alarmname, alarmdesc, trigger, time, strftime('%T',time) AS time2, LEAD(alarmstate) OVER(PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmstate, LEAD(time) OVER(PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmtime FROM ALARMDATA WHERE 1=1 AND alarmgroup = 'ALARM_CM' AND time >= '' ORDER BY time ) AS aa WHERE 1=1 AND alarmstate != 'Clear' ) AS bb GROUP BY tagname ORDER BY alarmcount DESC
